title: Ticket #3425: Concurrency limit settings not in configuration section of manual
description: The concurrency limit settings (CONCURRENCY_LIMIT_DEFAULT, <NAME>_LIMIT, and CONCURRENCY_LIMIT_DEFAULT_<NAME>) are described in /doc/admin-man/concurrency.tex (Administrator's Manual > Setting Up for Special Environments > Concurrency Limits) , but not in /doc/admin-man/configure.tex (Administrator's Manual > Configuration) with the other options. They should be.
remarks:
2013-Apr-04 11:27:11 by smoler:
Note that this task is not yet completed, as it requires answers to doc-related questions asked in #2863, which was resolved without its completed documentation.

2013-May-17 11:33:29 by smoler:
Greg completed this documentation task for the 8.0.0 release.
check_ins:
2013-May-07 17:19   Check-in [35643]: Improve concurrency limits documentation #3425 #2863 (By Greg Thain )
2013-Apr-04 11:14   Check-in [35337]: Add knob definitions for CONCURRENCY_LIMIT_DEFAULT and <NAME>_LIMIT, as well as a placeholder for CONCURRENCY_LIMIT_DEFAULT_<NAME>. ===GT=== #3425 (By Karen Miller )
creator: adesmet
